程序包 com.vdisk.net.exception
的使用

  • 使用com.vdisk.net.exception的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.vdisk.android  
    com.vdisk.net  
    com.vdisk.net.exception  
    com.vdisk.utils  
  • com.vdisk.android使用的com.vdisk.net.exception中的类 
    类和说明
    VDiskDialogError 
    VDiskException
    A base for all exceptions from using the API.
    VDiskPartialFileException
    Used when only part of a file was transferred to/from VDisk when using the API.
  • com.vdisk.net使用的com.vdisk.net.exception中的类 
    类和说明
    VDiskException
    A base for all exceptions from using the API.
    VDiskIOException
    Encapsulates an IOExceptions when using the API, typically resulting from network-related issues.
    VDiskLocalStorageFullException
    Thrown when writing to local storage and there is no more room.
    VDiskPartialFileException
    Used when only part of a file was transferred to/from VDisk when using the API.
    VDiskUnlinkedException
    Thrown when the API can only be used when linked but it's not.
  • com.vdisk.net.exception使用的com.vdisk.net.exception中的类 
    类和说明
    VDiskException
    A base for all exceptions from using the API.
    VDiskIOException
    Encapsulates an IOExceptions when using the API, typically resulting from network-related issues.
    VDiskServerException.Error 
  • com.vdisk.utils使用的com.vdisk.net.exception中的类 
    类和说明
    VDiskException
    A base for all exceptions from using the API.
